original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Lanka Sathosa announced that the prices of 10 products will be reduced with effect from Friday (9).
These items are Mung Beans, Dried Chili, Dhal, Red Nadu Rice, Thai Sprats, Import Bread Flour, Soya Meat (Bulk), Red Kekulu Rice, Gram, White Sugar.
Former UK PM Boris Johnson resigns from Parliament over ‘Partygate’
